markdown:
<title level="1" right="Background " pfs="">[Dreamer of the Verdant Moon](/Backgrounds.aspx?ID=144)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 67</row>

</column>

You spent your early days in the aftermath of one of the great ravenings. You survived thanks to your resourcefulness and perhaps your [patron’s](/Deities.aspx?ID=82) favor and were blessed with skills and drive thereafter, but you must always hold to his standards, lest the hunger from the depths seek you out once again.

Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Strength
or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost.

You're trained in the [Survival](/Skills.aspx?ID=16) skill, and the [Zevgavizeb Lore](/skills/lore) skill. You gain the [Ravening's Desperation](/Feats.aspx?ID=1213) skill feat.
name: Dreamer of the Verdant Moon

summary_markdown: You spent your early days in the aftermath of one of the great ravenings. You survived thanks to your resourcefulness and perhaps your  patron’s  …
text: Dreamer of the Verdant Moon Source Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows pg. 67 You spent your early days in the aftermath of one of the great ravenings. You survived thanks to your resourcefulness and perhaps your patron’s favor and were blessed with skills and drive thereafter, but you must always hold to his standards, lest the hunger from the depths seek you out once again. Choose two ability boosts. One must be to Strength or Wisdom, and one is a free ability boost. You're trained in the Survival skill, and the Zevgavizeb Lore skill. You gain the Ravening's Desperation skill feat.
